name: Dr. Sarah Quantum
title: Senior Quantum Researcher
bio: Dr. Sarah Quantum is a leading researcher in quantum computing with over 10 years of experience in quantum algorithms and error correction. She has contributed to numerous Qiskit improvements and published 50+ papers on quantum computing.

talk.title: The Future of Quantum Error Correction
talk.abstract: Exploring the latest advances in quantum error correction and its implications for near-term quantum devices.

name: Prof. Alex Chen
title: Professor of Computer Science
bio: Prof. Chen specializes in quantum algorithms and their applications to machine learning. He's the author of 'Quantum Computing: A Practical Approach' and leads the Quantum ML lab at MIT.

talk.title: Quantum Machine Learning with Qiskit
talk.abstract: Hands-on exploration of quantum machine learning algorithms using Qiskit's ML framework.

name: Maria Rodriguez
title: Quantum Software Engineer
bio: Maria is a passionate quantum software engineer who has worked on both Cirq and Qiskit. She advocates for quantum education and has mentored over 100 students in quantum computing.

talk.title: Building Your First Quantum Circuit
talk.abstract: A beginner-friendly introduction to quantum circuits and programming with Qiskit.
